I've tried to produce a smaller test program, but I haven't been able to reproduce the
problem there. I can't get the GC to run at the right moment.

the GC.

I can email you binaries and strace logs if that helps. Alternatively, I add some
debugging output in the runtime if you could provide some guidance about which variables
you need to see.
